PERSONA.NAME: Orsino
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Duke of Illyria, woos Olivia then Viola.

PERSONA.NAME: Sebastian
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Twin brother to Viola, thought to have died in a storm at sea.

PERSONA.NAME: Antonio
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A sea captain, friend to Sebastian

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Toby Belch
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Uncle to Olivia, a drunkard and prankster

PERSONA.NAME: Sir Andrew Aguecheek
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A wealthy guest in Olivia's home, woos Olivia.

PERSONA.NAME: Olivia
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: A rich countess, later marries Sebastian.

PERSONA.NAME: Viola
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: Twin sister to Sebastian, disguises herself as Cesario, in love with Duke Orsino.

PERSONA.NAME: First Officer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: One of two officers that arrest Antonio.

PERSONA.NAME: Second Officer
PERSONA.DESCRIPTION: One of two officers that arrest Antonio.
